headline:
Real-time context monitoring.
Inside your editor.
tagline: Track token budgets, score tab relevance, and manage context â€” a VS Code sidebar that pays for itself.

features.name: Token Budget Dashboard
features.description: Activity bar sidebar panel showing real-time token usage, budget meter, and per-file breakdown.

features.name: @tokens Chat Participant
features.description: Integrated chat commands for inline budget management directly in Copilot Chat.

features.name: Tab Relevance Scoring
features.description: Ranks open tabs by relevance using import analysis, path similarity, edit recency, and diagnostics.

features.name: Status Bar Indicator
features.description: Quick-glance budget status (LOW / MEDIUM / HIGH) in the bottom-right corner.

features.name: Context Rot Warnings
features.description: Warns when conversation turns exceed threshold. Helps you know when to start a fresh chat.

features.name: Pinned Files
features.description: Pin important files so they are always treated as high-relevance in context scoring.

settings.description: Tabs below this relevance score are marked as distractors (0–1)
Warn about context rot after this many turns

architecture.purpose: Subscribes to editor events, builds context snapshots, manages pinned files
Counts tokens per file using tiktoken when available, falls back to ~4 chars/token
Scores tabs 0–1 based on language, imports, path, recency, diagnostics
@tokens chat commands; read-only commands don't inflate turn counter

source.title: Build from Source
source.command:
git clone https://github.com/vfaraji89/tokalator.git
cd tokalator/copilot-context-monitor
npm install
npm run compile
